title: Apprentice armor
summaries: The Apprentice armor is a Hardmode magic and summoning armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep for 450000*45 [img:Defender Medal] in total, which consists of the Apprentice's Hat, Apprentice's Robe and Apprentice's Trousers.
A full set of Apprentice armor will provide the following benefits:

• +32 defense
  • +20% / +10% magic damage
  • +30% minion damage
  • +2 sentry slots
  • +20% magic critical strike chance
  • âˆ’10% mana usage
  • +20% movement speed

Additionally, wearing the full set will increase the attack range of Flameburst Tower sentries by 50%, allowing them to attack up to 84 tiles away. It also increases their projectile velocity by 40% and increases their field of view significantly.
The Dark Artist armor is a direct upgrade of the Apprentice armor.

statistics.Set Bonus:
Increases your max number of sentries
Flameburst field of view and range are dramatically increased
statistics.Buy: 45 [img:Defender Medal] (set)
statistics.Sell: 9 (set)
